channel.title: Aerospace on Vignesh Sundararajan
channel.description: Recent content in Aerospace on Vignesh Sundararajan

item.title: Fostering the love of Space Exploration with Purdue SEARCH
item.description: Starting from scratch Helping set up any organization from scratch is always hard. Defining the culture and accurately capturing the true essence of why we gather is everything. I have always loved minimal design and clutter free visualizations. One of my favourite videos that capture this process is from Apple, which I made sure to share during the very first Keynote of the organization. Here are some of the slides (and the intro!

item.title: My Graduate Research in Urban Air Mobility
item.description: Image Credits : NASA The need for secure and autonomous Urban Air Mobility The world as a collective is transitioning to a more autonomous future with the advent of intelligent transportation vehicles running on renewable energy. The UAM concept highlights the use of Urban Air Taxis, that can take off and land vertically from densely populated areas, and as such need to be highly reliable as the UAM market is projected to grow to roughly 28.
